name: hcmid-edd
tagline: Scholarly editions created by the Holy Cross Manuscripts, Inscriptions and Documents Club
body:
# Scholarly from the Holy Cross Manuscripts, Inscriptions and Documents Club#

This repository only contains github pages where I can link to github repositories of the [Holy Cross Manuscripts, Inscriptions and Documents Club][hcmid] that I advise.

Here are some starting points in the fall of 2013:

- [Geneva Lat.MS. 49][gen49], Jerome's *Chronicles*
- Primary sources for teaching introductory Latin
- Texts of Archimedes


[gen49]: http://neelsmith.github.io/gen49/

[hcmid]: http://shot.holycross.edu/hcmid/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
